channel.itunes:keywords: medabots, podcast, interview, medarot, voice acting
channel.title: Medcast (Medabots)
channel.itunes:author: Grady's Podcasts
channel.description: Medacast is our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots. Featuring interviews with voice actors from the show!
channel.itunes:summary: Medacast is our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots. Featuring interviews with voice actors from the show!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Medacast is our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots. Featuring interviews with voice actors from the show!

item.title: Rob Tinkler (Spyke & Cyandog)
item.description: In the first episode of 'Medacast', our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots, we talk to Rob Tinkler. Rob provided the voices for Spyke as well as his medabot Cyandog/Krosserdog. Other than Medabots, Rob has also provided voices for Bakugan, Cyberchase, Beyblades, The Adventures of Sam and Max: Freelance Police, and many more shows!
item.itunes:summary: In the first episode of 'Medacast', our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots, we talk to Rob Tinkler. item.itunes:subtitle: In the first episode of 'Medacast', our podcast all about the 1999/2000 children's anime Medabots, we talk to Rob Tinkler. Rob provided the voices for Spyke as well as his medabot Cyandog/Krosserdog.

item.title: Lisa Jai (Erika)
item.description: Sit down and hear the unique story of Lisa Jai. We cover voice acting roles in both Medabots and Resident Evil, her dedication in the form of overnight travel from study to gigs, and a focus on inclusion and disability including her struggles and causes she champions now.
item.itunes:summary: Sit down and hear the unique story of Lisa Jai. We cover voice acting roles in both Medabots and Resident Evil, her dedication in the form of overnight travel from study to gigs, and a focus on inclusion and disability including her struggles and causes she champions now.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sit down and hear the unique story of Lisa Jai. We cover voice acting roles in both Medabots and Resident Evil, her dedication, and a focus on inclusion and disability including her struggles and causes she champions now.

item.title: Darren Frost (Sloan)
item.description: Grady calls up Darren Frost to talk about all sorts of different things including Medabots - Darren recalls having to do a French accent in an episode alongside Sloan's iconic laugh. They also touch on other shows such as Bakugan, his work in a variety of commercials, and how he keeps his comedy work separate to his voice acting.
